price: (15) But We saved him and the companions of the ship, and We made it[1128] a sign for the worlds.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: [1128]- i.e., the ship, the event or the story.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-aṣḥāba al-safīnati wajaʿalnāhā āyatan lil'ʿālamīna
